data.title: Samsung Galaxy S 6 / S 6 edge - Factory Data Reset (Powered Off)
meta_keywords: App(s) crash reset the wireless device
Cannot send and or receive messages (text picture video)
Device makes a clicking popping buzzing noise during a call
Device does not ring vibrate during an incoming call
Cannot send and or receive email messages
Callers cannot hear me and or I cannot hear callers
Device powers off on its own
data.meta_description: Here's how to factory / hard reset your Galaxy S 6 / S 6 edge if the screen freezes or call, app, audio or sync issues occur and the device won't start up.
